definitions.definition: Nearest in place or position, having nothing similar intervening; adjoining .
examples: The man in the next bunk kept me awake all night with his snoring.
She lives a mile or two away, in the next village.
I live in the next house to the Grand Hotel.

subdefinitions.definition: Most direct, or shortest or nearest in distance or time.

definitions.definition: Nearest in order, succession, or rank; immediately following (or sometimes preceding ) in order.
examples: Please turn to the next page.
On Wednesday next , I'm going to Spain.
the next chapter; the next week; the Sunday next before Easter
The man was driven by his love for money and his desire to become the next Bill Gates.

definitions.definition: Nearest in relationship . ( See also next of kin . )

main_definition: Nearest in place or position, having nothing similar intervening; adjoining .
secondary_definitions: Nearest in order, succession, or rank; immediately following (or sometimes preceding ) in order.
( chiefly law ) Nearest in relationship . ( See also next of kin . )
